entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
